Uses of Interface
com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast.IField

  • Packages that use IField 
    Package Description
    com.ibm.team.repository.common.query  
    com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast  

    • Uses of IField in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query

      Methods in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query with parameters of type IField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.avg(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the average of the aggregate of values for the field.
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.count(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the count of (integer number of) the values aggregated for the field.
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.countDistinct(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the count of (integer number of) the distinct values aggregated for the field.
      IQuery IDataQuery.groupBy(IField aField)
      Adds the fields to the tuple to be used for grouping data results using aggregate functions (e.g., IDataQuery.count() Example:
      TeamQueryModel t = TeamQueryModel.ROOT;
      IDataQuery query = IDataQuery.FACTORY.newInstance(t);
      query.select(t.name(), query.count(t.members().itemId()));
      query.groupBy(t.name());

      would return results like:

      Team USA, 25
      Team Canada, 30
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.max(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the maximum of the aggregate of values for the field.
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.min(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the minimum of the aggregate of values for the field.
      IQuery IQuery.orderByAsc(IField aField)
      Sorts the results of the query by the values for the queryable field, in ascending order
      IQuery IQuery.orderByDsc(IField aField)
      Sorts the results of the query by the values for the queryable field, in descending order
      ISelectionElement IDataQuery.sum(IField f)
      Creates a selection element that represents the sum of the aggregate of values for the field.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IField IDynamicQueryModel.getField(java.lang.String name)
      Answer a model field for the named queryable field.
      Methods in com.ibm.team.repository.common.query.ast with parameters of type IField 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPredicate IItemQueryModel._exists(IItemQueryModel aQueryModel, IField lhs, IField rhs, IPredicate aPredicate)
      Creates a correlated subquery with the root query model target class joined with the target class of the input arg aQueryModel, using an equi join on the two input args lhs and rhs.
